DOC.brief_title: Food Effect Study For New Formulation
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 21 55 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 45 kg ( 99 lb ) . Baseline orthostatic hypotension define ≥20 mm Hg reduction systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) , ≥10 mm Hg reduction diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) development significant postural symptom ( dizziness , lightheadedness , vertigo ) go supine stand position . Subjects currently prescribe and/or take nitrate nitric oxide donor form either regular intermittent basis .
